sentences.sContent: The popularity of the www, the increase in types and quantity of products, and faultfinding of customers, etc, all of these accelerate the change of market environment into buyer"s market."
sentences.sContent_eng: The popularity of the www, the increase in types and quantity of products, and faultfinding of customers, etc, all of these accelerate the change of market environment into buyer"s market."
sentences.sCn: 万维网的普及，产品种类和数量的增长，顾客的挑剔等都在加速市场环境向买方市场的转变。

words.tran: 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误
[地质] 断层作用；断层错动；故障
（通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔
